mapper.sql: goods_id, goods_name, goods_pic, goods_price, addtime, user_id, goods_count, cart_id, attribute_detail_id, attribute_detail_name
mapper.select:
select t1.goods_id, addtime, user_id, goods_count, cart_id, t1.attribute_detail_id, t2.goods_name, t2.goods_pic, ifnull(t3.attribute_detail_name,'') attribute_detail_name, ifnull(t3.attribute_detail_price,t2.goods_price) goods_price from shop_cart t1 left join shop_goods t2 on t1.goods_id=t2.goods_id left join shop_attribute_detail t3 on t1.attribute_detail_id=t3.attribute_detail_id where 1=1
and user_id =#{pd.user_id} order by addtime desc
